State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Alchemy overhaul: Potions and poisons now restore or damage over time instead of instantly. Includes Health, Fatigue, Magicka, elemental damage, and buffs for drinks like Ale and Beer.
State.Name: Alchemy Overhaul

State.Author: dreamed1
State.Description: Adds skill requirements to advancement in the Mages and Fighters Guild. A novice spellcaster can no longer become arch-mage of Cyrodiil, nor can a Master of the Fighters Guild have no prowess in combat skills.
State.Name: Guild Advancement - Remastered and Streamlined

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: makes the location Pell's Gate more vividly and harmonious, adding a little farm and amenities
State.Name: Pell's Gate - Quaint addon

State.Author: ColdTyrant
State.Description: Play as a Necromancer - learn new unique spells, sacrifice the hearts of your victims to increase your stats, use Blood Magic, and join the Order of the Black Worm for unique buffs.
State.Name: Dark Path of The Necromancer

State.Author: Meridiano
State.Description: Removes the [NL] tag from items added or changed with ESP plugins we all know and love.
State.Name: NL-Tag Remover

State.Author: miken1ke
State.Description: Changes the sprint to be quicker and more upright.
State.Name: Alternative Sprint

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes close 3rd person camera closer and less off-centered for over the shoulder feeling.
State.Name: Better Close Camera

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Makes reticle less intrusive.
State.Name: Better Reticle

State.Author: electionis
State.Description: This mod fixes the white visual glitch while opening the door from west wing to great hall at the Cloud Ruler Temple.

State.Author: WilfulWayfarer

State.Author: PushTheWinButton

State.Author: Sisimshow
State.Description: This mod lets you skip the start of the game. It adds a tombstone to the starting prison that lets you change your player race, birthsign, class, and then finally skip to the end of the tutorial with the player standing outside the sewers with the Amulet of Kings in hand and their objective to find Jauffre. Includes starting items.
State.Name: Simple Start Skip - Alternative Start

State.Author: IRAPPIDZ
State.Description: Replaces vanilla armor sounds with cleaner, more modern assets.
State.Name: Armor Sound Overhaul

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: A simple and clean retexture of rocks, cliffs, and mountains. Replaces the most commonly seen rock textures.
State.Name: Cliffs of Cyrodiil

State.Author: slowpard
State.Description: Replaces the font used for journals and letters with a handwritten-style one, just like in the OG Oblivion.
State.Name: Handwritten Journals and Letters - Font Replacer

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Disables the ability to travel to city map markers at the start of the game. You'll need to discover them first like in Skyrim. Also covers Weynon Priory and Cloud Ruler Temple.
State.Name: No Starting Map Markers

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 2? 4? One for each version- options to replace DawnFang and Duskfang with something a bit more practical looking.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - DawnFang and Duskfang

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Remodels 8 of the unique melee weapons to look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Uniques

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 4 options for replacing the Elven helmet.
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Elven

State.Author: Halk Hogan PL
State.Description: Modification improves humans skin and makes it more realistic.
State.Name: Realistic High Quality Skin

State.Author: Hexaae
State.Description: Will increase traps effectiveness (player and NPCs) [b]increasing damage[/b] by a multiplier (i.e. traps will be deadlier at lower player levels), easy to configure.
State.Name: Not so deadly trap

Original.Name: Unmarked Locations Pack - Imperial City Isle-2892-1-0-1746920202.rar

State.Author: Gerald
State.Description: This mod adds new unmarked locations to Imperial City Isle!
State.Name: Unmarked Locations Pack - Imperial City Isle

State.Author: Caites
State.Description: Tweaks map menu, to make it more readable without losing information.
State.Name: Better Map Menu

State.Author: Jon Babb
State.Description: A fully remastered music expansion for Oblivion Remastered composed and produced by Jon Babb (Morrowind, 2002). This mod brings emotional, cinematic, and timeless new soundscapes to Cyrodiil. This first major release is currently in working condition and each music track flows seamlessly within the game.
State.Name: Oblivion Music Legend - Chapter One - Echoes of the Past

State.Author: Solo Man Games
State.Description: Fixes Oblivion Remastered's broken difficulty settings to provide balanced difficulty that feels tough, but fair.
State.Name: Difficulty Remastered

Original.Name: NPCs Come to Life - Naiad Edition-3363-1-0-5-1747619797.zip

State.Author: NaiadGirl and mixxa77
State.Description: mixxa77's incredible overhaul of NPC schedules, now in Oblivion Remastered, expanded to include the Imperial City! Now with Mail Delivery!
State.Name: NPCs Come to Life - Naiad Edition

State.Author: wxMichael
State.Description: More colorful and clear icons for your map!
State.Name: Colorful Clear Map Icons

State.Author: Misberave
State.Description: Makes the equipped items easier to recognize by changing the UI color. Can be used with the Menu Recolor mod
State.Name: Equipped Item Colors

State.Author: Tewix
State.Description: Lumière adds hundreds of lights to the outdoors of Cyrodiil. Lamp posts along roads and signs, lanterns outside inns, Imperial City Waterfront and more
State.Name: Lumiere - Lights of Cyrodiil

State.Author: KEI
State.Description: Redesigns every two-handed animation in Oblivion Remastered: faster great-swords, vertical war-hammers, two fresh idle stances, new walk/run/guard. Pure animation swap—no scripts, no crashes, small DPS bump, lore-friendly.
State.Name: Morihaus Might Two Handed Overhaul

State.Author: Prohagon
State.Description: Changes the Dark Brotherhood Saddle on Shadowmere from a light brown to a dark gray/black
State.Name: Shadowmere DB Saddle Fix

State.Author: GodschildGaming
State.Description: Dynamically loads new esp item form ids into the TesSyncmap for mesh assignment
State.Name: UE4SS TesSyncMapInjector

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Mod overhauls the tiny shack in Imperial City, adding more storage, some pretty clutter, a garden and cozy decor.
State.Name: Eli's Waterfront Shack Overhaul

State.Author: Fox_Tek
State.Description: Various alternative city entrances, exits, player areas and prison escape opportunities!
State.Name: Urban Bypass - Alternative City Entrances and Exits

State.Author: Willock aka Cerebii
State.Description: Remade from scratch 5K+ main menu video in the style of the classic MapLoop.bik
State.Name: Classic Main Menu Remastered

Original.Name: Airgetlam -Modern Magic Sounds Rework Oblivion RE-1958-1-2PA-1746668975.7z

State.Author: Satafinix
State.Description: High quality Modern Magic casting Sounds Replacer for Oblivion Remaster
State.Name: Airgetlam -Modern Magic Sounds Rework Oblivion Remaster -

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: 7 options to make Umdra look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Umbra

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: Remodels 8 of the unique melee weapons to look a bit more practical.
State.Name: Practical Arsenal - Uniques

State.Author: HugAMuffin
State.Description: A more protective-looking Glass helmet.
State.Name: Protective Headgear - Glass Helmet

State.Author: Dayng
State.Description: Removes the white outline that appears when hovering over items.
State.Name: Remove Item Outlines

State.Author: NaiadGirl
State.Description: Previously lacking Goblin Wars now have automatic triggers to happen without player involvement!
State.Name: Enhanced Goblin Wars

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: Redistributes armor and weapons across all of Oblivions city guards to give them distinct looks and sensible positions.
State.Name: Guards Revised

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: this mod adds the god statue to the correspondent shrine, also offerings related to the deity and some food and ingredients for the wandering pilgrim. for more immersion
State.Name: Wayshrines - Quaint addon

State.Author: Odashikonbu
State.Description: UE4SS lua scripting resource for using in-game console in UE4SS.
State.Name: Console Framework UE4SS

Original.Name: M To Close Map - Mod Only (Requires UE4SS)-1212-1-0-1-1746722518.zip

State.Author: Cosmin G
State.Description: Makes it so you can press M to close the map
State.Name: M To Close Map

State.Author: Tewix
State.Description: NOT A RESHADE. Only in-engine changes. Deepens shadows both indoors and outdoors for a more dramatic and realistic lighting effect. It also softens volumetric fog and does mild color correction to compensate for deeper shadows. Minimal performance impact
State.Name: Shadows Reworked (with fog reduction)
